name: Keep it Secret (LD50)
description:
At the end of the last company holiday party, you accidently shared an embarassing secret with a coworker. They promised to keep quiet, but you overheard them talking to the biggest gossiper in the whole office. You must try to prevent the spread of the rumor, but don't let you boss catch you outside of your office.

Use WASD to move and press Spacebar to break up any gossiping coworkers you find.
